original_text:
Bingo Billions
Considerando la popolarità del bingo e delle slot all’interno della comunità online, è sorprendente che questi due giochi non siano combinati più spesso. Questo è esattamente ciò che NextGen Gaming ha creato con Bingo Billions, portando il tema del bingo in un gioco di slot. Ma le due idee funzionano insieme?
Una grafica tradizionale
Se siete alla ricerca di un’esperienza di gioco tranquilla, siete venuti nel posto sbagliato. Il bingo vi sarà cantato immediatamente all’inizio del gioco e vi sembrerà che non si fermi mai e poi mai.
Musica invadente, colori incredibilmente brillanti e simboli brillanti creano un attacco a quasi tutti i sensi in una volta sola, al punto che potreste dimenticare il motivo per cui siete venuti.
Le bobine del gioco sono impilate sullo sfondo di un appariscente studio televisivo e sono popolate da simboli come la pila di contanti, i biglietti del bingo, il lingotto d’oro singolo, tre lingotti d’oro, oltre a sei palline da bingo numerate 88, 55, 49, 36, 21 e 16. Il bingo show host e il logo di Bingo Billions! assumono il ruolo di icone di funzionalità, sostituendosi ad altri simboli e innescando rispettivamente il bonus round principale, offrendo al contempo anche i payout da soli.
Perché se il tema non vi disturba, la video slot Bingo Billions è in realtà un gioco NextGen abbastanza OK.
Non vincerà alcun premio, e di certo non ti renderà miliardario, ma pagherà spesso nel gioco base e raramente dovrai aspettare molto più di 50 giri per attivare la funzione di gioco gratuito.
Lì si ottengono tutte le tue vittorie triplicate per 3, quindi ogni tanto abbiamo fatto da 30 a 50 volte la nostra scommessa. Anche se la maggior parte delle volte ti avvicinerai a 20.
Tuttavia, se si riesce a guardare oltre il design estremo e la colonna sonora, ci sono grandi vittorie possibili su Bingo Billion.
Funzioni e simboli della Slot Machine
La funzione Free Spins vede tutti i premi triplicati. Tre simboli ti fanno fare dieci giri, quattro ti fanno fare 15 e ti piaceranno 20 giri se ne abbini cinque. Grazie alla triplicazione di tutti i premi, è possibile vincere somme consistenti su questa funzione.
Oltre a questo, ci sono simboli Wilds and Scatter che possono offrire belle vincite. Il Wild ha due funzioni, in quanto può sostituire i simboli di base, ma può anche pagare pesantemente se ne vince cinque su una linea. I simboli Scatter possono moltiplicare la vostra scommessa fino a 100 volte, il che può anche portare a qualche bella vincita.
Per quanto riguarda il gioco, Bingo miliardi è forse una delle slot migliori in circolazione, si può vincere bene e abbastanza spesso, e le caratteristiche sono divertenti e frequenti.
Ma il gioco fa così tanto rumore che sembra troppo in fretta, che anche vincere soldi non è come dovrebbe essere se qualcuno ti grida “BINGO” costantemente mentre lo fai.
Griderai bingo tutta la notte mentre inizierai ad accumulare i premi trovando da 3 a 5 simboli corrispondenti di una varietà di oggetti a tema bingo. I premi iniziano con la ricerca di sei diverse palline da bingo, con alcuni dei tuoi preferiti come “chiave della porta 21” e “due signore grasse 88” e questi pagano premi che vanno da 5 a 200 monete. Sarete dentro per alcuni premi più grandi quando si inizia a trovare alcuni degli oggetti a tema bingo come bingo carte che valgono fino a 750 monete, mentre i mazzi di contanti sono il premio top paytable a 1.500 monete quando si trova 5 di loro su una linea giocata
Tieni d’occhio anche i tre simboli bonus del gioco, che sono il Wild, lo Scatter e i simboli della funzione Free Games Feature. Il simbolo Wild ha due funzioni. Può assegnare vittorie istantanee fino a 5.000 monete quando ne trovi 5 su una linea vincente, mentre ha anche il potere di sostituire tutti i simboli di base del gioco per ottenere i migliori premi della tabella dei pagamenti. I simboli sparpagliati possono pagare grandi premi ovunque appaiano, e hanno il potere di moltiplicare la tua Scommessa Totale per un massimo di 100 volte. La funzione Giochi Gratuiti si attiva quando appaiono da 3 a 5 simboli sui rulli simultaneamente con 3 simboli che innescano 10 giochi gratuiti, 4 simboli che innescano 15 giochi gratuiti e 5 simboli che innescano 20 giochi gratuiti. Durante la funzione Giochi Gratuiti tutti i premi vengono triplicati.
Altre Slot Machine simili
Se apprezzi le Slot Machine con tema il bingo, immagina di trasportare questa tua passione al tempo dei cavalieri nella Avalon Slot. Viaggio nella mitica isola per girare per avere la possibilità di vincere su Avalon Slot Avalon, il gioco a cinque rulli e 20 payline di Microgaming.  Qui c’è un bonus di giri gratis e poche altre caratteristiche.

raw_translation.response:
Bingo Billions
Considering the popularity of both bingo and slots within the online community, it's surprising that these two games aren't combined more often. This is exactly what NextGen Gaming has created with Bingo Billions, bringing the theme of bingo into a slot game. But do the two concepts work together?
A traditional graphic style
If you're looking for a peaceful gaming experience, you've come to the wrong place. Bingo will immediately start singing to you at the beginning of the game, and it won't seem to ever stop.
Invasive music, incredibly bright colors and shiny symbols create an attack on almost all senses at once, to the point where you may forget why you came.
The game's reels are stacked against the backdrop of a flashy television studio and are populated by symbols such as a stack of cash, bingo tickets, a single gold ingot, three gold ingots, as well as six numbered bingo balls: 88, 55, 49, 36, 21 and 16. The bingo show host and Bingo Billions logo take on the role of feature icons, replacing other symbols and respectively triggering the main bonus round while also offering payouts on their own.
If you're not bothered by the theme, the video slot Bingo Billions is actually a fairly okay NextGen game.
It won't win any awards, and certainly won't make you a billionaire, but it pays out frequently in the base game and you rarely have to wait more than 50 spins to activate the free game feature.
There, all your wins are tripled for 3, so we've occasionally won from 30 to 50 times our bet. Although, most of the time you'll get closer to 20.
However, if you can look past the extreme design and soundtrack, there are great wins possible on Bingo Billions.
Slot Machine Features and Symbols
The Free Spins feature sees all prizes tripled. Three symbols get you ten spins, four get you 15 spins, and you'll enjoy 20 spins if you match five. Thanks to the tripling of all prizes, you can win decent sums on this feature.
Apart from this, there are Wild and Scatter symbols that can offer nice payouts. The Wild has two functions, as it can replace basic symbols, but can also pay out heavily if you win five on a line. The Scatter symbols can multiply your bet up to 100 times, which can also lead to some nice wins.
When it comes to the gameplay, Bingo Billions is perhaps one of the best slots out there, you can win well and quite often, and features are fun and frequent.
But the game makes so much noise that it seems too fast, and even winning money isn't as satisfying as it should be when someone is constantly shouting "BINGO" at you.
You'll shout bingo all night as you start racking up prizes by finding 3 to 5 matching symbols of a variety of bingo-themed objects. Prizes start with finding six different bingo balls, with some of your favorites like "key to door 21" and "two fat ladies 88" and these pay prizes ranging from 5 to 200 coins. You'll be in for some bigger prizes when you start finding some of the bingo-themed objects like bingo cards which are worth up to 750 coins, while cash bundles are the top paytable prize at 1,500 coins when you find 5 of them on a played line.
Also, keep an eye out for the game's three bonus symbols, which are the Wild, the Scatter, and the Free Games Feature symbols. The Wild symbol has two functions. It can award instant wins up to 5,000 coins when you find 5 on a winning line, while also having the power to substitute all of the game's basic symbols to land you the best paytable prizes. The scattered symbols can award big prizes wherever they appear, and have the power to multiply your Total Bet up to 100 times. The Free Games Feature is triggered when 3 to 5 symbols land on the reels simultaneously with 3 symbols triggering 10 free games, 4 symbols triggering 15 free games, and 5 symbols triggering 20 free games. During the Free Games Feature all prizes are tripled.
Similar Slot Machines
If you enjoy bingo-themed slot machines, imagine bringing this passion back to the time of knights in the Avalon Slot. Journey to the mythical island to spin for a chance to win on Avalon Slot, the Microgaming 5-reel, 20-payline game. Here, there's a free spin bonus and a few other features.

raw_translation.response:
Bingo Billions is a game that combines the popularity of bingo and slot machines in the online community. NextGen Gaming has created a unique blend of these two games, which begs the question, do they work together?

The graphics are traditional, but the game is far from tranquil. The bingo theme is present throughout, with bright colors, loud music, and vivid symbols, making it a sensory attack. Despite this, the game is an alright experience, with frequent payouts, and it rarely takes more than 50 spins to activate the free game feature.

The Free Spins feature triples all winnings, and the Wild and Scatter symbols offer opportunities for big payouts. The Wild substitutes base symbols and can pay out handsomely if you get five on a line. The Scatter can multiply your bet by up to 100 times.

Overall, Bingo Billions is one of the best slot machines out there. You can win frequently, and the features are fun and engaging. However, the game is so loud that it can become overwhelming, undermining the playing experience.

You will find yourself yelling "BINGO!" all night long as you work towards collecting prizes by matching 3-5 symbols. Prizes range from 5 to 200 coins, with bingo cards valued at up to 750 coins, and cash bundles paying out a top prize of 1,500 coins when you hit five on a played line.

Look out for the Wild, Scatter, and Free Games Feature symbols, which can trigger bonuses and triple all winnings during the Free Games Feature. If you enjoy bingo-themed games, consider trying Avalon Slot, set in the time of knights, where you can journey to the mythical island and win big.

Considering the popularity of both bingo and slots within the online community, it's surprising that these two games aren't combined more often. This is exactly what NextGen Gaming has created with Bingo Billions, bringing the theme of bingo into a slot game. But do the two concepts work together?
A traditional graphic style
If you're looking for a peaceful gaming experience, you've come to the wrong place. Bingo will immediately start singing to you at the beginning of the game, and it won't seem to ever stop.
Invasive music, incredibly bright colors and shiny symbols create an attack on almost all senses at once, to the point where you may forget why you came.
The game's reels are stacked against the backdrop of a flashy television studio and are populated by symbols such as a stack of cash, bingo tickets, a single gold ingot, three gold ingots, as well as six numbered bingo balls: 88, 55, 49, 36, 21 and 16. The bingo show host and Bingo Billions logo take on the role of feature icons, replacing other symbols and respectively triggering the main bonus round while also offering payouts on their own.
If you're not bothered by the theme, the video slot Bingo Billions is actually a fairly okay NextGen game.
It won't win any awards, and certainly won't make you a billionaire, but it pays out frequently in the base game and you rarely have to wait more than 50 spins to activate the free game feature.
There, all your wins are tripled for 3, so we've occasionally won from 30 to 50 times our bet. Although, most of the time you'll get closer to 20.
However, if you can look past the extreme design and soundtrack, there are great wins possible on Bingo Billions.
Slot Machine Features and Symbols
The Free Spins feature sees all prizes tripled. Three symbols get you ten spins, four get you 15 spins, and you'll enjoy 20 spins if you match five. Thanks to the tripling of all prizes, you can win decent sums on this feature.
Apart from this, there are Wild and Scatter symbols that can offer nice payouts. The Wild has two functions, as it can replace basic symbols, but can also pay out heavily if you win five on a line. The Scatter symbols can multiply your bet up to 100 times, which can also lead to some nice wins.
When it comes to the gameplay, Bingo Billions is perhaps one of the best slots out there, you can win well and quite often, and features are fun and frequent.
But the game makes so much noise that it seems too fast, and even winning money isn't as satisfying as it should be when someone is constantly shouting "BINGO" at you.
You'll shout bingo all night as you start racking up prizes by finding 3 to 5 matching symbols of a variety of bingo-themed objects. Prizes start with finding six different bingo balls, with some of your favorites like "key to door 21" and "two fat ladies 88" and these pay prizes ranging from 5 to 200 coins. You'll be in for some bigger prizes when you start finding some of the bingo-themed objects like bingo cards which are worth up to 750 coins, while cash bundles are the top paytable prize at 1,500 coins when you find 5 of them on a played line.
Also, keep an eye out for the game's three bonus symbols, which are the Wild, the Scatter, and the Free Games Feature symbols. The Wild symbol has two functions. It can award instant wins up to 5,000 coins when you find 5 on a winning line, while also having the power to substitute all of the game's basic symbols to land you the best paytable prizes. The scattered symbols can award big prizes wherever they appear, and have the power to multiply your Total Bet up to 100 times. The Free Games Feature is triggered when 3 to 5 symbols land on the reels simultaneously with 3 symbols triggering 10 free games, 4 symbols triggering 15 free games, and 5 symbols triggering 20 free games. During the Free Games Feature all prizes are tripled.
Similar Slot Machines
If you enjoy bingo-themed slot machines, imagine bringing this passion back to the time of knights in the Avalon Slot. Journey to the mythical island to spin for a chance to win on Avalon Slot, the Microgaming 5-reel, 20-payline game. Here, there's a free spin bonus and a few other features.
